details.excerpt: Jay Myers has over 14 years of experience spanning both business and technology disciplines, with the last 7 years at Best Buy, a large American consumer electronics retailer. During his tenure at Best Buy, he has been the "face" of the company's Semantic Web and Linked Open Data work, serving as an invited speaker and proponent of these technologies at conferences, notable universities, and media outlets. He has a passion for merging open data technologies together with retail business and e-commerce to produce results that benefit both consumers and the enterprise. He tweets regularly @jamyers or can be contacted via email at jay.myers@bestbuy.com
